author: SciShow
description:
Visit https://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free and get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

Playing tabletop roleplaying games like Dungeons and Dragons can be emotionally rewarding. In fact, a lot of players like to joke that TTRPGs can be just as good as going to therapy. And that might even be true, so here's how you could end up playing D&D with your therapist.

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: Yes, You Can Use DnD As Therapy
